attributes.additional_details:
Current government data needs reviewed (https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/119174/acmd-cannabis-report-2008.pdf)
According to the cited report; the gateway theory and perception that marijuana use leads to an increase in crime is largely disproven. 
Cannabis has great potential to be massively beneficial to the British economy. Colorado reported over 300 million in taxable income in 2019. 
Public is largely in support
attributes.background: End the prohibition on cannabis use and make it available recreationally.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551846
